TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler(object sender, StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs sbdevent);
.class public auto ansi sealed StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler(sender As Object, sbdevent As StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs)
public delegate void StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs ^ sbdevent);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表將處理 之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，委派，類別列舉型別和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, the delegate, the class, the enumeration and the property. 要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼在表單中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 呼叫`InitializeStatusBarPanels`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/VB/form1.vb#2)]
